name: bigquery-previewer
description: A VS Code extension to analyze BigQuery SQL files via dry runs.

bigqueryPreviewer.authMode.description: Authentication mode for BigQuery (Application Default Credentials or Service Account).

bigqueryPreviewer.serviceAccountKeyPath.description: Path to the service account key file (if using service account authentication).

bigqueryPreviewer.showScanWarnings.description: Enable or disable scan warnings when the scan size exceeds the threshold.

bigqueryPreviewer.scanWarningThresholdMB.description: Threshold for scan size warnings in MB.

bigqueryPreviewer.autoRunOnSave.description: Automatically analyze queries on file save.

bigqueryPreviewer.enableStatusBar.description: Enable or disable the status bar feedback.

bigqueryPreviewer.enableNotifications.description: Enable or disable popup notifications for warnings and errors.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
